title: bssndrpt expected argument "i" ?
body:
every time i try to launch the game from lol launcher.exe i get this message with a lot of codes i tried to delete leagueclient and lanch it from the old client and it didnt work ;( i got the game from my friend on a  flash disk and it worked but when i installed a new windows 7 ultimate 64 bit this message popped when i tried to lunch the game ....
pls help and ty for ur help

replies.body: Deleting or modifying files is likely to result in more issues than before.  :(  You should grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in this case and perform a clean reinstall.  Before doing that, though, the initial error may be caused by a security setting which in turn could halt your reinstall.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide just to be sure that your game files have access.
yeah and there is something, when i lunch the game from a flash drive it works fine

You'll want to run League from your primary internal drive.  Running off a flash is going to cause you a lot of problems.  For example, your game files won't save, so you'll have to update every time you open the client.

i cant clean reinstall it that will take me forever to download it again 
does the clean reinstall delete the game then install it again?
